metadata.name: definelocal_swf_5
metadata.description: Comprehensive tests for DEFINE_LOCAL opcode (0x3C) - defines local variable with value, including redefinition, multiple types, and edge cases

notes: DefineLocal (0x3C) pops a value and a name from the stack, then creates/updates a local variable
According to SWF spec: defines a local variable and sets its value; if variable exists, value is updated
Without full function infrastructure, it behaves like SetVariable in global scope
Tests cover: numeric values (positive, zero, negative), string values, and variable redefinition
All features specified in the SWF spec for this opcode are fully implemented and tested
